feed.title: Gladys Assistant Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.46.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add column functionality to EditDashboard component by @Terdious in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2097
  • Save last calendar view by @bertrandda in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2121
  • Upgrade socket.io dependencies to improve Gladys Plus client reconnection by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2125
  • Add binary chart by @Terdious in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2094

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.45.1...v4.46.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.46.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Refactor Chart.jsx to improve readability and maintainability by @Terdious in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2126
  • refactor: Update ApexChartComponent to dynamically adjust height baseâ€¦ by @Terdious in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2117
  • Gladys Plus: Increase ackTimeout to 60s by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2128

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.46.0...v4.46.1

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.47.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • zigbee2mqtt: new LixeeTic expose: EASF03 by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2131
  • Remove arm/v7 builds by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2134
  • Scene: Fix responsive on tablets for scheduled trigger by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2136
  • Scene: Change log level for checkCalendarTrigger by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2137
  • Camera: Replace ffmpeg-fluent by native commands by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2132
  • Upgrade DuckDB to 1.1.1 by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2144
  • feat(z2m): Add pilot wire mode by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2140
  • Handle multi service device in HomeKit by @bertrandda in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2139
  • Backup : When restoring backup, clean DuckDB WAL file before writing new file by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2145

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.46.2...v4.47.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.48.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Clean DuckDB schema on restore by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2147
  • Ask AI in scene by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2129
  • Scene: Save tag filters & search in URL by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2148
  • Add Pilot Wire Mode to scene by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2149
  • DuckDB: Properly close all connections & database on shutdown by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2151
  • Camera: Add TCP transport for RTSP stream by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2150
  • Chart: Fix binary query, return first value by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2153

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.47.0...v4.48.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.49.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add develco iomzb 110 by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2152
  • fix(z2m): Hide Coordinator by @cicoub13 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2155
  • Fix translation in user back/left home trigger by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2162
  • ChatGPT: Add "NO_RESPONSE" option in case no answer is needed by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2163
  • Fix Sensitive Data Exposure by @bnematzadeh in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2158
  • Scene: Device state change trigger should update value in case presence sensor change by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2166
  • Scene: Device state trigger can now check that condition was valid for X minutes by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2156
  • Dashboard: Add push button feature by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2165
  • Scene: add new action send zigbee2mqtt msg by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2160
  • feat(z2m): Add specific features to Lixee Tic device by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2141

New Contributors

  • @bnematzadeh made their first contribution in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2158

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.48.0...v4.49.0
